metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22187 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions of Gitlab EE/CE before 13.6.7. A potential resource exhaustion issue that allowed running or pending jobs to continue even after project was deleted.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
